::Zardus/Dark One/Breakdown/Reptilica::

Zardus frowns on the results of the tests as they come up on the screen. The 
machine was going haywire!

"It seems you're beyond this technology," he remarks, whatever else he wanted 
to say being drowned out by a transmission and a beeping from his wrist comp.

"Very well" he says, walking out of the lab and motioning for Sickle to 
follow him, "Meet me at the bridge."

Zardus enters the bridge, tapping a few keys to bring up a reading on the 
strange probe in Alliance territory. He activates his comm-link again, this 
time to Dark One.

"Dark One, what's your location?" he says into the device.

"Flying toward base. I have a new recruit that you might want to reprogramm," 
Dark One replies. His comm system was only heard in his head, and didn't 
reach his cockpit, or its occupant.

"Allright, can you send Pyro or Breakdown to a probe that has been picked up 
in the area? I'll send you the coordinates," Zardus says, terminating the 
transmission after sending the coordinates.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Recieving a new order from Dark One, Breakdown turns around, driving off 
toward the probe.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Reptilica's shuttle lands some hundred yards away from where the strange 
craft had crashed (Deamon Wulf), the Alliance bot walking slowly toward the 
mountain.

He was ready for an attack, but hoped that none would come.
